commit.title: [fixup] Re-add `nf_enter` to workaround bugs in the core tactic layer.
commit.message:
[fixup] Re-add `nf_enter` to workaround bugs in the core tactic layer.

So far conversion seems affected by some strange bug as without this
term comparison fails. Example:

```coq
Set Primitive Projections.
Set Universe Polymorphism.

NonCumulative Record NullGenerators : Type := Build_NullGenerators
  { ngen_indices : Type;  ngen_type : ngen_indices -> Type }.

NonCumulative Record Nullification_Modality : Type := Nul
  { unNul : NullGenerators }.

Variables (Lex : Nullification_Modality -> Type).

Goal forall (B : NullGenerators), False.
Proof.
intros B.
assert (Lex (Nul B)) as X; [admit|].
pose (O := Nul B).
fold O in X.
```

Gaëtan notes that this is likely due to `EConstr.eq_constr` not using
the `evar_map` for universe variables. This seems like a serious bug.

the `evar_map` for universe variables. This seems like a serious bug.

commit.title: [fixup] Re-add `nf_enter` to workaround bugs in the core tactic layer.
commit.message:
[fixup] Re-add `nf_enter` to workaround bugs in the core tactic layer.

So far conversion seems affected by some strange bug as without this
term comparison fails. Example:

```coq
Set Primitive Projections.
Set Universe Polymorphism.

NonCumulative Record NullGenerators : Type := Build_NullGenerators
  { ngen_indices : Type;  ngen_type : ngen_indices -> Type }.

NonCumulative Record Nullification_Modality : Type := Nul
  { unNul : NullGenerators }.

Variables (Lex : Nullification_Modality -> Type).

Goal forall (B : NullGenerators), False.
Proof.
intros B.
assert (Lex (Nul B)) as X; [admit|].
pose (O := Nul B).
fold O in X.
```

Gaëtan notes that this is likely due to `EConstr.eq_constr` not using
the `evar_map` for universe variables. This seems like a serious bug.
